name: df-rngo
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(crngo, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cablo), wf(cv(s1), cxp(crn(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))), crn(cv(s0)))), wa(wral(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s4, crn(cv(s0)), w3a(wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cv(s1), cv(s4)), co(cv(s2), cv(s1), co(cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s4)))), wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s4))), co(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cv(s0), co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s4)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s1), cv(s4)), co(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s4)), cv(s0), co(cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s4)))))))), wrex(s2, crn(cv(s0)), wral(s3, crn(cv(s0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cv(s3)), wceq(co(cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3)))))))))
comment: Define the class of all unital rings. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
